node.text:
Wow check out what @chenaholic did. I love this cocktail and even before I read the description, I thought campfire. And it's named after me so that has to be a plus right? LOL. Great job!⁣
⁣⁣
Crafted Campfire⁣
..........⁣
2 oz Campfire Whiskey (see below for recipe)⁣
.5 oz Coffee Liqueur⁣
.25 oz Averna⁣
2 dash Chocolate Bitters⁣
⁣
Rim a rocks glass with @bouverycv Chocolate Liqueur. Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into rocks glass over a large ice. Garnish with a toasted marshmallow.⁣
⁣
Campfire Whiskey Recipe: Add equal parts bourbon and single malt scotch whisky in a mason jar (I used Bulleit and Lagavulin 16). Add a few Graham crackers and let it infuse for an hour. Strain through a coffee filter.⁣
⁣⁣
